title: SO... I just bought BARD
body: http://postimg.org/image/o9kyw12ib/ Not sure what happened, apparently there is no image of him yet.

replies.body: Don't buy him, I bought him and it took my IP and the option to buy him is still there, you don't get anything out of buying him...
Are you saying I can buy 2 BARD?????
Well technically yes... but it'll just be a waste of IP/RP
Umm okay. They will fix it in next patch i guess
I just had the same problem, hope this is fixed soon.

Hey Shelobian.

How did you purchase him? IP or RP?

Does the champ show up as owned now in your inventory?
I purchased with IP and no, it seems to be non refundable or I would just re-buy him.
Thanks for the info.  Just to confirm - he is not in your list of owned champions & still available to buy?
Last question - did you make the purchase before the patch, or after?
This was before the patch, I know it was stupid but I thought if he was in the store it was legit.

Ahh ok that explains it.  It looks like our store sales opened a few hours early for some reason, and purchases made before the patch haven't gone through correctly

You'll need to send a ticket through to the support team, and they should be able to fix it up.

Sorry to bother you again, I sent one a couple of hours ago to unauthorized charges to my account but I think I should have sent it under "I have a question about league of legends". Should I just leave the ticket I have pending or remake it?
Don't worry, your ticket will be addressed.

Thanks for confirmation.

We're taking a look into it now.
yeah fun times, Wasting 7800 ip because "OH MAH GOD! new hero is out gotta buy!" but sadly loses the 7800 ip.
When you have all the champions IP just bulids up; what's another 7k anyway ;d.
hope they do, or its good bye precious IP {{item:3070}}
